mapper.insert: insert into ecs_comment (comment_id, comment_type, title, id_value, email, user_name, comment_rank, add_time, ip_address, status, parent_id, user_id, rec_id, comment_tag, buy_time, good_num, hide_username, order_id, content) values (#{comment_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment_type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id_value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment_rank,jdbcType=BIT}, #{add_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ip_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{parent_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rec_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment_tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buy_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{good_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hide_username,jdbcType=BIT}, #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_comment set comment_type = #{comment_type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_value = #{id_value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_rank = #{comment_rank,jdbcType=BIT}, add_time = #{add_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ip_address = #{ip_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, parent_id = #{parent_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rec_id = #{rec_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment_tag = #{comment_tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buy_time = #{buy_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, good_num = #{good_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hide_username = #{hide_username,jdbcType=BIT}, order_id = #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where comment_id = #{comment_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select comment_id, comment_type, title, id_value, email, user_name, comment_rank, add_time, ip_address, status, parent_id, user_id, rec_id, comment_tag, buy_time, good_num, hide_username, order_id, content from ecs_comment where comment_id = #{comment_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
